function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Low-cost IAQ monitor may have limited accuracy and reliability, leading to incorrect measurements of pollutants.","Impact":"Incorrect measurements can result in a false sense of security and failure to address harmful pollutant levels.","Mitigation":"Regular calibration and validation of the IAQ monitor against scientific-grade instruments.","Technologies":"Scientific-grade IAQ monitoring instruments, calibration tools, validation protocols.","People":"Households using the low-cost IAQ monitor.","Owner":"Research institutions, governmental agencies."},{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation and pollutant levels may go unnoticed due to limited monitoring parameters.","Impact":"Unnoticed pollutant levels can lead to health risks and inaction in addressing indoor air quality issues.","Mitigation":"Incorporation of additional monitoring parameters to cover a wider range of indoor air pollutants.","Technologies":"Multi-parameter IAQ monitors, advanced sensor technology.","People":"Households using the low-cost IAQ monitor.","Owner":"Research institutions, IAQ monitoring companies."},{"Description":"Reliance on statistical analysis software (IBM SPSS Statistics) for data analysis may introduce errors or biases.","Impact":"Inaccurate data analysis can lead to incorrect conclusions and recommendations regarding indoor air quality.","Mitigation":"Manual verification of results, validation against alternative data analysis methods.","Technologies":"Alternative data analysis tools, manual data verification protocols.","People":"Researchers and scientists using statistical analysis software.","Owner":"Research institutions, scientific organizations."}]}
